original_title: Namal Rajapaksa places deposit to contest Presidential Election
original_body_lines: The security deposit has been placed for the presidential candidate of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) Namal Rajapaksa to contest the upcoming Presidential Election.
SLPP General Secretary Sagara Kariyawasam has placed the deposit on behalf of Namal Rajapaksa at the Election Commission this morning (14).
